title: Spring Rain
marks: Signature, Date, Seal, and Marks L center; Dated:[ 丁丑秋日]
description: fourteen lines of calligraphy on a fan; mostly alternating between four characters and one character; signature is very last (far L) line; previous two lines of two characters; one intaglio and one relief stamp LLC; mounted on white board with gold trim
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
